text: Great service, good beer and reasonably priced set lunches.

Haven‚Äôt been to Hot Kitchen since they moved. This is my first time here. Not too crowded even though it‚Äôs lunch time. They have affordable lunch sets at $15.90. Topped up a bit for the beef steak which was nicely done. Ordered the chicken wings too. Quite filling. Service is good
The set lunch was absolutely delightful, and the staff were warm and accommodating, taking the time to explain the menu in detail with great patience.

Always live their food there . Friendly staff there too .. our usual hang out after work place for drinks & food . U can even ask for ‚Äúspecial menu‚Äù (subject to availability, need to check in advance) üòâüòù you wont regret the food there !
Great place to hang over draft beer and yakitori. Good sticks and pizza. Friendly owner and fast service. Noisy in the inside with large crowds. Otherwise a cosy place for a catch up
